SELECT kc.id,code,kc.orderNo,orderDate,totalNumber,totalPrice,remark,refundTypeId,r.type AS refundTypeName, sys.userName AS checkByName, xs.updateDate,c.userName AS createByName,u.userName AS updateByName from kc_salefromware kc,xs_refundtype r,xs_order xs LEFT JOIN sys_user c ON xs.createBy = c.userId AND c.isDel = 0 LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON xs.updateBy = u.userId AND u.isDel = 0 LEFT JOIN sys_user sys ON xs.checkBy = sys.userId AND sys.isDel = 0 WHERE kc.orderNo=xs.orderNo and xs.refundTypeId=r.id and kc.isDel=0 and xs.isDelete=0 and xs.type=1
and code like concat('%',#{code},'%')
